title: Textile Fragment, "(Rods)"
medium:
Medium: linen (98%) and cotton (2%)
Technique: vertical bands of plain weave joined by long weft floats, with discontinuous supplementary warp patterning
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 25.4 x 63.5 cm (10 x 25 in.)
description: Wide vertical bands of plain weave in off-white are joined together by long off-white weft floats. Vertical bars in orange, green, pink, blue, yellow and violet are formed by discontinuous supplementary weft patterning. Number 409.
